name: Easy WordPress Dashboard
author: Technoinfonet

sections.description:
Modifies existing wordpress dashboard to a simple navigation icons.
– This plugin removes all the extra sections from the dashboard.
– Gives quick access to settings and users
– Used fontawesome icons

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/easywpdash directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Will it change the core files ?

No, it will not change any core files.
